{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05201v1", "title": "Ground-state blowing-up solutions for a Hardy-Sobolev equations on a
  manifold", "summary": "We prove the existence of blowing-up families of solutions to an equation of
Hardy-Sobolev type in high dimensions. These families are of minimal type. The
sole condition is that the potential of the linear operator touches a critical
potential at the singular point. This condition is sharp as shown by the first
author in [Cheikh-Ali, Pacific J. of Math. 2022].", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-05-08T12:59:03Z"}
